data.text: @DontWantAReboot @rosemcgowan Definitely and I get so angry when I see some of people comments say about her 😲😔. She's strong beautiful brave and a true inspiration #STOPCharmedReboot

@char_charmed @rosemcgowan I couldn't agree more sweet 👏. And with what was going on in her personal life, yet she remained strong & committed. Takes balls to do what she did, she's an inspiration to all who have experienced similar fates.

#STOPCharmedReboot

@DontWantAReboot @rosemcgowan Exactly she kept the show going and am forever greatful. She also brought the Charmed family back together. It was too much for her but she still pushed through. I got the up most respect for her for that #STOPCharmedReboot

@char_charmed @rosemcgowan Very true. To take over from Shannon, must have been a hard challenge. Not many shows last when they kill off a main character, so for the show to remain strong for so long, is a testament of Rose's strength & acting ability.

#STOPCharmedReboot
@DontWantAReboot Me to i think @rosemcgowan was amazing and I really appreciate her hard work but I think it came at a cost of losing herself 😔 #STOPCharmedReboot

@char_charmed I'm glad they did too. Rose did an amazing job 💕

#STOPCharmedReboot
@DontWantAReboot I never knew that. I take it they said no lol #STOPCharmedReboot
